interface.name: FileDownlink
interface.comment: Port to downlink a file and it's metadata

arg.name: callbackId
arg.comment: Metadata Field: Unique Id to map this file to the command that generated it

arg.name: fileGroupCreateTime
arg.comment: When the File Group this File comes from was created (i.e. image capture time - each image LINE is a "File", so an image is a "File Group").

arg.name: fileGroupLineNumber
arg.comment: Which "line" in the File Group this file is (i.e. image line number - each image LINE is a "File", so an image is a "File Group").
